keyMappings:
unmapAll

“【スクロール】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
map  j scrollDown
map  k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
“Scroll a half page down 
map J scrollPageDown
map d scrollPageDown
“Scroll a half page up
map K scrollPageUp
map u scrollPageUp
#scrollFullPageDown
#scrollFullPageUp
map <C-h> scrollLeft
map <C-l> scrollRight
#scrollToLeft
#scrollToRight


“【リンク・URL】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
map yy copyCurrentUrl
“ コピーしているのがURLではない場合はgoogle検索結果が出てくる
#map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
#map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
“Go up the URL hierarchy
map gu goUp
“Go to root of current URL hierarchy
map gU goToRoot
“Open a link in the current tab
map f LinkHints.activateMode
“Open a link in a new tab
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
“Open a link in a new tab & switch to it 
map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
“Open multiple links in a new tab
map d LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
“Download link url 
map gd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
“Open a link in incognito window シークレットウインドウ
#LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
“Copy a link URL to the clipboard
#LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
“Follow the link labeled previous or <
map gh goPrevious
“Follow the link labeled next or > 
map gl goNext

“ 【その他】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
map r reload
map Q enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
#enterVisualLineMode
“Pass the next key to the page ???
#passNextKey
“Focus the first text input on the page 
map gi focusInput
“Select the next frame on the page ???
#nextFrame
“Select the page's main/top frame ???
#mainFrame
“Create a new mark
#Marks.activateCreateMode
“Go to a mark
#Marks.activateGotoMode
map ? showHelp
“View page source
#toggleViewSource


“【vomnibar】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
“Open URL, bookmark or history entry
map o Vomnibar.activate
“Open URL, bookmark or history entry in a new tab
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
“Open a bookmark
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
“Open a bookmark in a new tab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
“Search through your open tabs
map e Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
“Edit the current URL
#Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
“Edit the current URL and open in a new tab
#Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

“【Find】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
map / enterFindMode
“Cycle forward to the next find match
map n performFind
“Cycle backward to the previous find match
map N performBackwardsFind

“【履歴】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
“Go back in history 「戻る」
map H goBack
“Go forward in history 「進む」
map L goForward

“【タブ操作】ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
map t createTab
“Go one tab left
map h previousTab
“Go one tab right
map l nextTab
“Go to previously-visited tab
map ; visitPreviousTab
“Go to the first tab
map s firstTab
“Go to the last tab 
map d lastTab
“Duplicate current tab
map yt duplicateTab
“Pin or unpin current tab
map gp togglePinTab
“Mute or unmute current tab
#toggleMuteTab
“ Close current tab
map x removeTab
“Restore closed tab 閉じたタブを復元
map X restoreTab
map W moveTabToNewWindow
#closeTabsOnLeft
#closeTabsOnRight
#closeOtherTabs
“Move tab to the left 
map << moveTabLeft
“Move tab to the right
map >> moveTabRight
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
az: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
